headline.main: Deutsche Bank CEO Says More Attractive to Keep Postbank Now
headline.print_headline: Deutsche Bank CEO Says More Attractive to Keep Postbank Now

lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank sees keeping hold of Postbank as more attractive now than it was two years due to changing market conditions, its chief executive told staff in a message after the bank announced plans for a rights issue and a revamp.
snippet: Deutsche Bank sees keeping hold of Postbank as more attractive now than it was two years due to changing market conditions, its chief executive told staff in a message after the bank announced plans for a rights issue and a revamp....
